Title: Gregory's Girl
Actors: John Gordon Sinclair, Dee Hepburn, Jake D'Arcy, Clare Grogan
Plot: In his Scottish New Town home, gangling Gregory and his school-friends are starting to find out about girls. He fancies Dorothy, not least because she has got into the football team - and is a better player than him. He finally asks her out, but it is obviously the females in control of matters here, and that very much includes Gregory's younger sister.
Awards: Won 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.
Production: National Film Finance Corporation, Scottish Television Enterprises
